summary: This is a brief email from July 31, 2020, regarding the signing of a declaration in the FOIA case Times v. BOP, 20-cv-833, which concerns Jeffrey Epstein. The sender informs the recipient that they have spoken with 'John' and offers assistance.

persons.name: John
persons.context: Mentioned by the email sender as someone they just spoke with regarding the declaration in the Epstein FOIA case.

events.title: Email regarding declaration signing
events.description: An email is sent discussing the signing of a declaration in the FOIA case Times v. BOP, 20-cv-833, related to Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated July 31, 2020, concerning legal proceedings related to Jeffrey Epstein.
It references a FOIA case: Times v. BOP, 20-cv-833.
The subject involves the signing of a declaration in that case.
A person named 'John' is mentioned as having been spoken to about the matter.
